amendment.description: Amendment allowed the Administrator of the SBA to view favorably FAST grant applicants that use accredited SBDC's in determining the award of a FAST grant.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in House Report 110-603 to allow the Administrator of the SBA to view favorably FAST grant applicants that use accredited SBDC's in determining the award of a FAST grant.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
